title: Who was Britain’s Greatest Prime Minister? Robert Walpole
itunes:title: Who was Britain’s Greatest Prime Minister? Robert Walpole
itunes:subtitle: In the first episode of our new series on the prime ministers that experts believe accomplished most during their tenure, Jeremy Black profiles Robert Walpole.
description:
In the first episode of our new series profiling the prime ministers that experts believe accomplished most during their time in 10 Downing Street, historian and author Jeremy Black celebrates Britain’s first prime minister – pioneering 18th-century statesman Robert Walpole.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
